title: (x) A Squarish Sans...! - Fedra Sans Display Black Condensed {Ben M}
content:
Any idea what this is? Absolutely love it! Reminds me of Dino dos Santos' Leitura Headline Sans, but it's clearly not as compressed, a kind of 'fatter'. Anyone know what this is? I'd LOVE to buy it!!

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2010-03-11 at 3.31.05 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100314030131/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202010-03-11%20at%203.31.05%20PM.png) | 229.73 KB |
author: ebspoony

comments.content: That's the lovely [Fedra Sans Display Black Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20100314030131/http:/www.typotheque.com/fonts/fedra_sans_display_2/black_condensed/character_set)

Of course it is, thank you so much Bendy! I last worked with Fedra in a branding project for the Hartmannbund, which the company I worked for inherited from an excellent art director. I've always since loved it. Thanks for refreshing my memory. Gotta add it to my collection now!
